entities.name: the riddle house
entities.description: The location where the conversation is taking place.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: One of the characters in the conversation, a wizard who is serving Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a powerful wizard who is being served by Wormtail.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: A young wizard who is well-protected and difficult to reach.

relationships.description: Lord Voldemort wants Wormtail to bring him a substitute for Harry Potter, who is well-protected.
Lord Voldemort commands Wormtail to go and fetch a substitute for Harry Potter.
Wormtail is tasked with bringing back a suitable person in place of Harry Potter.
